page.title: 01REVIEW OF BLOCK ID:1900128.
page.content: The majority of this area is designated as an {Inner City Area,} with all its attendant problems i.e.Industry and Employment, Social and Community Facilities, Housing, and Industrial and Commercial Environment. The remainder of the block comprises a mixture of private housing, new and old commercial development, shopping areas, derelict industrial sites and recreational facilities. The area is bisected North/South by the{River Hull which, although it is still in use as a commercial waterway, has declined in importance because of dock development on the banks of the Humber. Much of the old back to back housing has been, or is being, demolished and new estates built.These estates tend to be adjacent to main thoroughfares and yet with their own self contained system of roadways, mostly cul-de-sacs.
